Node.Text: We don't have to tell you anything.
But... either way, we will hopefully see you tomorrow. Be alert tonight. Goodbye...
We're leaving before either of us gets killed. We figured it would be best to spend the night elsewhere instead of tempting fate.
Thomas, who do you think is the killer?
It's Virginia, it has to be. She's too calculating, too severe. I don't know why she's doing this, but it makes the most sense.
It has to be Caroline. Her whole innocent facade isn't cutting it for me. Something sinister's going on in her mind...
We wish you the best tonight, operator. Hopefully we'll see you tomorrow...
Yes. Watch your back, and look out for anything suspicious... until we meet again.
